short_summary: Please summarize the bid callouts in English
description: Data collection exercise to determine the availability of new zero-emissions vehicles (ZEVs) for sale in Canada and to provide insights into how inventory levels may affect the demand and sales of ZEVs going forward in the 2022-2024 period and onwards. The RFP contains a contract for Period: 2022-12-15 to 2024-03-31.
